message.content: {"id": "5340", "title": "Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect", "description": "", "OB": "When attempting to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. However, eventually, the exception list comes up, disregarding the cancellation request. It is expected that the cancellation request be honored, or alternatively, the cancel button should be disabled. To achieve this, when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, pass false for the cancelable parameter.", "EB": "When attempting to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. However, eventually, the exception list comes up, disregarding the cancellation request. It is expected that the cancellation request be honored, or alternatively, the cancel button should be disabled. To address this issue, when invoking ProgressMonitorDialog.run, please ensure that the cancelable parameter is set to false.", "SR": ""}

origin.input_content:
